answers.answer: Normally when u have that the baby tends to be big..
Some drs do like to induce you earlier if you have it, some don't.
I'm going to ask cause if my doc if he will cause if he'll be that big pushing him vaginal terrifys me to death.

Its not always the baby being big the baby can be smaller than usuall I have it and sadly my baby's about a lb under weight kind of scares me but I have about 7 weeks to go I hope he gains a lil more by then

I've had gestational diabetes with all 3 pregnancies; my first was 6lbs 10oz and my second was 6lbs 11oz, I'm waiting to see what my boy weighs when he's born. If you manage your blood sugar well, the less the chances are of having a larger baby strictly due to the GD.
You Likely Wouldn't Have A 12Lb BabyVaginal Birth.
I had GD with my first and she was just shy of 8lbs induced at 42 weeks. this one they want to induce at 39. guess it depends on the doctor   (:

question: I was told by my doctors nurse that my sons growth will be monitored because I have it. Then my older sister told me her coworkers grandson came out 12 lbs cause the mother had it too. Im going tobask at my appointment tomorrow but i was wondering if I could be induced early so he won't be tooo big.
title: gestational diabetes question
